message: Let's start fair and split the money evenly.  What do you think?
I think I deserve a bit more, how about 60-40?
I'm willing to compromise, but 60-40 is too much. Let's try 55-45. We can still get a good amount of money if we agree.
I'll meet you halfway from my last offer, 58-42 is my new proposal.
I'm not sure why you're being so stubborn.  I'm willing to give you a little more, but 52-48 is my final offer. Let's not waste any more time.
